'''''Tidal Guide (II)''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (II)]]''. To complete this achievement,  the player needs to follow 3 [[Seelie]] in the [[Liffey Region]] and [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]] to their Seelie Courts.
